title: Demon Beauty
description: A dark fairytale beauty and the beast retelling.Find solace in strange places. Fleeing a war, having lost everything, Rosalin finds herself in the forbidden forests of the west. A dark place where creatures and magic dwell. In the home of a monster, Rosalin finds refuge, but another war rages beyond her sight, and Rosalin finds herself in its midst. author: Stefanie Simpson
